name: Selenium

dosage.notes: Selenomethionine or selenium yeast forms preferred. Narrow therapeutic window — don't exceed 400mcg.

keyFindings: Essential for glutathione peroxidase — key antioxidant enzyme
SELECT trial: complex results for cancer prevention
Critical for thyroid hormone conversion (T4 to T3)
description: Essential for glutathione peroxidase — key antioxidant enzyme
